alert.note: Alert for Charlton; Clinch; Echols; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 10:49AM EDT until June 19 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Echols County in southeastern Georgia... Southern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1130 AM EDT. * At 1049 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Homerville to 10 miles northwest of Needmore to 10 miles east of Statenville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Homerville, Fargo, Argyle, Stephen Foster State Park and Needmore. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
